events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product isn't what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product and not matching the order.
Your case has been assigned to one of our customer support agents who will assist you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order, and I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the product you received along with your order number so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
I have attached the photos showing the incorrect product and here is my order number: 987654321. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours. You do not need to return the item.
Thanks for the quick response and a hassle-free solution. I appreciate the no-return refund, that’s great customer service.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that there are no further issues we can assist with.
We are closing this support case now. Please feel free to reach out anytime if you have any other questions or concerns.
